location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 27 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the plunder of a Cutch Nowree (a small sea-going vessel) off Zanzibar, and an investigation to establish whether the Joasmee [Āl Qāsimī] Shaikh, Sultan bin Sughur [Sulṭān bin Saqr], is responsible. It has one enclosure: the draft of a letter from the Resident to the Government Agent at Sharga [Sharjah] respecting the above subject.
